title: 437 16 "For His Friend! Bon Clay Goes to the Deadly Rescue!"Transliteration: "Dachi dakara – Bon Kurē Kesshi no Kyūshutsugyō" (Japanese:友達だから　ボン・クレー決死の救出行) Yoshihiro Ueda Yoshiyuki Suga February 7, 2010(2010-02-07)[22]
transformers_text: 437 16 For His Friend Bon Clay Goes to the Deadly Rescue Transliteration Dachi dakar a Bon Kur Kes shi no Ky shuts u gy Japanese Yoshihiro Ueda Yoshiyuki Suga February 7 2010 2010 02 07 22 After Luffy's defeat Magellan has him imprisoned in Level 5 until the poison kills him Mr 2 having taken Han nya bal's appearance resolves to rescue Luffy in order to make up for abandoning him in the fight with Magellan but learns that no antidotes can save him now Mr 2 then decides to seek out Emporio Ivan kov Queen of Kama b akka Kingdom to heal Luffy but learns that he has vanished in one of the demon ing away incidents Mr 2 heads to Level 5 with Buggy and Mr 3 who quickly abandon him when the Wolf Unit attack Luffy remains determined to rescue Ace despite his condition and Mr 2 arrives at his cell to save him
